techmeme.title: The US unveils new rules to curb flow of advanced chips produced by TSMC and others to China and sanctions 16 Chinese companies building China's chip industry (Mackenzie Hawkins/Bloomberg)
A 28-year-old woman describes her "relationship" with ChatGPT, or Leo as the chatbot named itself, which became her therapist, erotic partner, and advisor (Kashmir Hill/New York Times)
Microsoft says it will no longer support Office apps, known as Microsoft 365 apps, on Windows 10 after October 14, 2025 (Tom Warren/The Verge)
How gamers are turning gaming PCs into fashion statements: iBuypower customers spend an average of ~$2.4K on custom-built gaming PCs and $1.6K on prebuilt ones (Cecilia D'Anastasio/Bloomberg)
LinkedIn launches free AI tools built on top of its own AI tech and data: a Jobs Match tool for job seekers and a recruitment AI agent for small businesses (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
